gep.model

Class HomoeoticGeneElement<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gep.model.GeneElement<T>
      • gep.model.GeneTerminal<T>
        • gep.model.HomoeoticGeneElement<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The return type of the execution of this terminal
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HomoeoticGeneElement<T>
extends GeneTerminal<T>
    This class represents a homoeotic gene terminal. It is a leaf in an expression tree but links to another gene that will be executed when this terminal will be executed. This allows to evolve the hierarchy of genes in GEP by itself.
    Author:
    Johannes Wortmann
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int linkedGeneId
      The index of the gene in the chromosome that is linked by this homoeotic terminal.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HomoeoticGeneElement

        public HomoeoticGeneElement(int linkedGeneId)
        Creates a homoeotic gene that links to the gene with the given gene id. The description is automatically generated.
        Parameters:
        linkedGeneId - The id of the gene this gene element links to

      • HomoeoticGeneElement

        public HomoeoticGeneElement(java.lang.String description,
                            java.lang.String shortDescription,
                            int linkedGeneId)
        Creates a homoeotic gene that links to the gene with the given gene id.
        Parameters:
        linkedGeneId - The id of the gene this gene element links to
        description - A string describing the function of the terminal
        shortDescription - A short form used to generate the string representation of the terminal.
